page.title: 18SAUGHTON PARK CONT.
page.content: Most of the people who visited the park, were between the ages of 41-65 and 31-40, and were housewives or Civil Servants as their office is just across the road. People like the park because it is so quiet and there are lots of birds and flowers. Most people love to relax and have a sleep, or read or have a seat and eat their lunch. Many people like the Park but a few people complained about the vandalism and would have liked less concreted areas. Some people would have liked more facilities in the Park such as an ice-cream van, a children's farm, a shop, more trees and floodlights. All of these amenities would attract more people to spend time in Saughton Park Gardens and they would have more fun.
